page.description: Redis Client class, used to communicate with a Redis Server.

methodref.name: BRPop
methodref.description: BRPop Command. returns last element and removes or block until one is available.

methodref.name: BRPopLPush
methodref.description: BRPopLPush Command. Pop a value from a list, push it to another list and return it; or block until one is available.

methodref.name: CreateClient
methodref.description: Replicate a database.

methodref.name: CreateListener
methodref.description: Create a named listener, takes a cr-lf delimited list of redis commands to listen on.

methodref.name: Decr
methodref.description: Incr Command.

methodref.name: Del
methodref.description: Delete Command.

methodref.name: Execute
methodref.description: Execute Command.

methodref.name: Exists
methodref.description: Exists Command.

methodref.name: Expire
methodref.description: Expire Command. Key will go away in # of seconds.

methodref.name: Get
methodref.description: Get Command.

methodref.name: GetReply
methodref.description: Block until next result (i.e. subscribe).

methodref.name: GetSet
methodref.description: GetSet Command. Gets old value at same time it sets new value.

methodref.name: Incr
methodref.description: Incr Command.

methodref.name: Keys
methodref.description: Keys Command. Use pattern to search for keys.

methodref.name: LIndex
methodref.description: LIndex Command. Get an element from a list by its index.

methodref.name: LInsert
methodref.description: LInsert Command. Inserts a value index a list after (or before) the item in find.

methodref.name: LLen
methodref.description: LLen Command. Get the length of a list (with optional value to stop at).

methodref.name: LPop
methodref.description: LPop Command. Remove and get the first element in a list.

methodref.name: LPush
methodref.description: LPush Command. Prepend one or multiple values to a list.

methodref.name: LPushX
methodref.description: LPushX Command. Prepend a value to a list, only if the list exists.

methodref.name: LRange
methodref.description: LRange Command. Get a range of elements from a list.

methodref.name: LRem
methodref.description: LRem Command. Get a range of elements from a list.

methodref.name: LSet
methodref.description: LSet Command. Set the value of an element in a list by its index.

methodref.name: LTrim
methodref.description: LTrim Command. Trim a list to the specified range.

methodref.name: Persist
methodref.description: Persist Command. Removes any expiration on key.

methodref.name: RPop
methodref.description: RPop Command. Remove and get the last element in a list.

methodref.name: RPopLPush
methodref.description: RPopLPush Command.Remove and get the last element in a list

methodref.name: RPush
methodref.description: RPush Command. Append value to list.

methodref.name: RPushX
methodref.description: RPushX Command. Append value to list, only if the list exists.

methodref.name: Rename
methodref.description: Rename Command.

methodref.name: RenameNX
methodref.description: Rename Command. Only performs the rename if the key does not exist.

methodref.name: Set
methodref.description: Set Command.

methodref.name: TTL
methodref.description: TTL Command. returns time to live for a key.
